39090.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「ふぁ～。ねっむ～。:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Whew! Sleepy. I'd better get to bed,

39091.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><turn_pc:
Oh, I'm sorry. I've been so busy with research that I haven't slept recently. I'm taking a break right
now, so could you leave me alone for a bit? So I'll leave you alone for a bit.

39093.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ハネツキ博士と:
Dr. Hanetsuki, a researcher of demon miasma, has been frequenting the king's room recently. I wonder if
something happened to him.

39094.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ハネツキ博士は:
Dr. Hanetsuki is still young, but his knowledge of demon miasma is the best in Royal City. He is trusted by the
king and is a reliable person.

39095.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「魔瘴の発生場所:
I'd like to find out where the demon miasma outbreaks occur and do a little research to see how much damage has
been done. Soldiers are checking the roadsides, and if there's an outbreak, it's probably in a cave or some other
out-of-the-way place.

39096.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「北だけ ほかに:
The north area has a higher concentration of demon miasma than the other areas, so it may be located
north of Kamiharmui North.

39097.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><close_i:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><close_irai>I will secretly follow you until we
reach our destination, so please don't
hesitate to ask me <pc>.

39098.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「あっ。<pc>:
Ah. That's . I found out where the demon miasma occurred, but I can't get in because of that monster.
I beat the monster to a pulp. Oh, I know you remember where it is, right? You remember where it is, don't you?

47790.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「まず 北へ行っ:
First, go north and when you get to Kamiharmui North, go further north to Imui Underground Cave. Nice to meet
you!

39099.「<pc>よ。そなたには\n ハネツキ博士の研究を 手伝ってもらいたい。\n<b:
. I need you to help Dr. Hanetsuki with his research. On the east side of Kamiharmui Castle, near

Ah. That's <pc>. Sorry. I'm
busy right now. If you need anything
else, can you come back later?

44499.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「暗黒大樹が 魔:
I'm studying the effect of the Dark Tree on demon miasma, and I need you to go check out the demon miasma near
the big tree.

44554.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「暗黒大樹の場所:
You know where Dark Tree is, don't you? When you get out of the castle, go north to Kamiharmui North. Then go
northwest until you reach Sunset Meadow, and then continue west. Good luck.

44500.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「ハッパと ふた:
Happa and I went to Karuku to do some research. She seems to be feeling more energetic. I wonder if he likes the
town so much that he's going for a walk now.

44501.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ハネツキ博士が:
Dr. Hanetsuki's boy. He was just as peculiar as Dr. Hanetsuki. He was looking around the castle like he was
curious. I wonder what kind of hillbilly he is.

44502.「ハネツキ博士から 報告を受けたぞ。\n 暗黒大樹が 王都周辺の大地に\n 魔瘴:
Dr. Hanetsuki reported that the Dark Tree is causing demon miasma in the land around Royal City. It seems that
the Dark Tree is causing demon miasma in the land around Royal City. We will have to take action sooner or later,
but now what should we do?

44503.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「最近 ハネツキ:
Lately, Dr. Hanetsuki has been frequenting the King's Chamber with an unfamiliar boy. Who on earth is that
boy?

44504.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ハネツキ博士が:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>Dr. Hanetsuki went inside. I wonder if
there has been any progress in demon
miasma research.

44505.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「暗黒大樹が あ:
As long as the Dark Tree exists, there will be no peace for us Elf. But it seems that King Nikoroi is serious to
go with that strategy.

44506.「暗黒大樹が こたびの現象を\n 引き起こしているとは 恐るべき事態だが\n そ:
That the Dark Tree is causing this phenomenon is frightening, but there is no need to be scared about it. If
soldiers from all over the world gathered in the Royal City, the threat could be easily eliminated.

44507.「王都付近で 魔瘴が増加しているようだな。\n 現在 ニコロイ王の命令により\n:
It seems that demon miasma is increasing in the vicinity of Royal City. Soldiers from all over the
country are now gathering in Royal City by order of King Nikoroi.

44510.「ニコロイ王なら 兵士たちを率いて\n 暗黒大樹のもとへ 向かったぞ。:
King Nikoroi would have led his
soldiers to the Dark Tree.

44511.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「暗黒大樹が ま:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>I had no idea that Dark Tree was
Yggdrasil. I'm so shocked. I'm so
shocked that I can't think straight.

44512.「魔瘴対策を はじめから考え直さねばな。\n だが 時間は残されておらんし\n:
I'll have to rethink my measures against demon miasma from the very beginning. But time is running out,
and I don't know what to do.

44513.「ニコロイ王が 兵士たちを連れて\n 暗黒大樹から戻られたぞ。:
King Nikoroi has returned from the
Dark Tree with his soldiers.

44515.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「魔瘴が 王都に:
If demon miasma invades the Royal City, people will panic and there will be a disaster. We can't. We shouldn't
get upset. Let's calm down and consider what to do.

44516.「多くの学者に研究させたが 結局\n 魔瘴には 有効な対策が見つからなかった。\:
I've had many scholars study it, but in the end, no effective countermeasure was found for demon
miasma. Is all is not well?

44517.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「ニコロイ王は:
King Nikoroi has been thinking about something since he returned from the Dark Tree. It seems that the
destruction of the Dark Tree ended in failure, but I wonder if the countermeasure against demon miasma is
safe.

44520.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ハネツキ博士か:
I heard from Dr. Hanetsuki. I don't know the details, but the power to take in demon miasma in the Dark Tree
has been restored. The demon miasma covering the core has disappeared. The demon miasma that appeared near Royal
City seems to have disappeared as well.

44521.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><turn_pc:
Happa is traveling back and forth between the sanctuary and the Dark Tree. He uses the power of the
sanctuary to eliminate the demon miasma near the Dark Tree. Sometimes she comes to visit. She was wondering
if she was an Elf or not, but she's lucky to have found her place in life.

44522.「今後 暗黒大樹を侵さないよう\n 大樹の長と 約束を交わしてきたぞ。\n<br:
I made a promise to Tree Chief not to invade the Dark Tree in the future. I am grateful to you for your help in
this matter. I am grateful to you . But that boy Happa, who could make demon miasma disappear, may
be the savior of Eltona Continent.

44523.「ここは 王の間だ。\n 王都の近くに発生した 魔瘴が消え\n ニコロイ王も よ:
This is the King's Chamber. The demon miasma that occurred near the Royal City has disappeared, and King Nikoroi
is pleased.

34144.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「この宝物庫には:
The treasuries of Royal City Kamiharmui are on display in this treasury. You are free to visit, but

34145.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「うっ うっ グスン:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Ugh, ugh, gusun. Poor Nikoroi. I can't
stop crying. It's Nikoroi's fault that
I can't get any work done.

34146.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ご家族のなかった:
King Nikoroi, who had no family, lived a happy life after he came of age and welcomed his wife into the world. But
five years ago, he lost his wife to an epidemic. And then... He became very interested in finding out what
happened to Abandoned Castle.

34147.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「そこにいる リ:
Lynn over there is the princess of this castle, but she's an odd one who wants to help out in the kitchen. I
have a feeling she's going to start saying she wants to be the head chef.

34148.<icon_exc><turn_rot 2.3><pipipi_mid>「しっ！:
<icon_exc><turn_rot 2.3><pipipi_mid>Shh! Grandpa. Do not use the
princess's name as "MOUTH". It will
bring disaster!

34149.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「私らも トシを:
We are getting old. We want to forget the bad things of the past and live out the rest of our lives in peace. By
the way, old man. I promised not to talk about Abandoned Castle, but lately I keep talking about it!

34150.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「玉座の間に 飾って:
The portrait in the throne room is a picture of Nikoroi and his family found in the Abandoned Castle a long
time ago. It depicts the previous king Nashroi and queen Agushna. Then there is the young Nikoroi and her sister. I
wonder why such a happy family died without Nikoroi.

34151.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「近頃は ぶっそうで:
I'm having a hard time keeping up these days. Everywhere I go there are monsters and demon miasma is gaining
momentum. I should never have become a soldier.

34152.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「この大きな桜は 前:
I heard that this big cherry tree is the tomb marker of the former King Nashroi and Queen Agushna who died in
the previous castle. I heard that the princess also passed away on the same day, but I guess the princess is the
only one who is not mourned.

34153.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「大昔の カミハ:
In ancient times, the people of Kamiharmui built Kamiharmui Castle to protect the sacred land called the
Sacred Land! The royalty protected the sacred land from generation to generation, and the sacred land
protected the people with its power. But..! 50 years ago, at the same time as the death of the royalty, the
sacred land somehow lost its power.

34155.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「わしらにとって 昔:
For us, the old Kamiharmui Castle was our hometown where we were born and raised and the place of our memories.
But even so, we had no choice but to abandon that castle. I can't believe that Rita would do something like
that.

34157.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「すまぬ…… クチが:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I'm sorry, my mouth must have slipped.
Please forget what I just said.

34158.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「近頃 キュウス:
Recently, a man named Kyusuke has been visiting us often, and he is a very interesting person. He works very hard
at everything he does, and he seems to like both King Nikoroi and the Minister Cottle very much.

34160.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「私も ニコロイ:
At the behest of King Nikoroi, I have also researched as much as I could about the royal family who passed away
50 years ago. But no matter which book I consulted, there was no mention of the reason for their deaths. Nor the
name of the king's sister.

34161.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「捨てられた城に:
If you wish to visit the Abandoned Castle, you must leave the castle, pass through the north gate of the
city, and head for the interior of the Dream Forest. It is forbidden by the people of the castle to go near the
castle. Moreover, it is said that a ghost appears there these days. Nikoroi-sama is a very skilled man,
but Minister Cottle must be worried if something should happen to him.

34162.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ようやく ニコ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I heard that Nikoroi-sama has finally
returned home. Now the Minister can
rest easy for today.

34163.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「私ら年寄りが 昔の:
I hope you can at least understand why we old people keep secrets about the past. No one needs to know what
happened at Abandoned Castle 50 years ago. It would only make Nikoroi unhappy.

34164.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ええ。ええ。\n:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Yeah. Yes. Nikoroi is already back.
You look very pale.

34165.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「<pc>どの:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><pc> Welcome back! King
Nikoroi is waiting for you. Hurry up
and get inside.

34166.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「アグシュナ王妃:
I heard that Queen Agushuna was a person of incomparable magical power. It is hard to believe that her will
created the illusion. It is hard to believe, but it is not impossible.

34167.「あの時…… いまわの際に 母上は\n 暗黒大樹の葉を求めていた。あれには\n:
At that moment, at the very last moment, your mother asked for the Dark Tree Leaf. It must have meant

in the castle and guide me. O . Please bring back the Dark Tree Leaf to me. The Cursed Land

34168.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「うへっ ニコロ:

37585.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そこの みごとな桜:
The beautiful cherry tree there is several hundred years old and was brought from the former Kamiharmui

34169.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「キュウスケはん:
Kyusuke, you've been active again, haven't you? He really does everything with great skill, doesn't he? He's a

34170.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「大昔より 数多:
It is said that since ancient times, many brave warriors have gone to the West to cut down the Dark Tree, and

take even a leaf from it. Go with an open mind.

34171.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「ニコロイ王に:
King Nikoroi has inspired me so much that nowadays everyone in the castle is talking about the old days. I'm
more worried about Lendersia's girlfriend.

10133000.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「近頃 キュウス:

34172.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よくぞ 無事に:

sound! You may immediately deliver the
Dark Tree Leaf to King Nikoroi.

34173.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「え？ また ニ:
What? Nikoroi has gone to the Abandoned Castle again? What a pity. I thought he wouldn't be going out again

34174.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「聞いたかい？:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Did you hear? King Nikoroi has gone to
the Abandoned Castle again. What the
hell is the king thinking?

34175.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「<pc>よ。\:
. I want you to follow King Nikoroi to Abandoned Castle as soon as possible. I can trust you to
take care of the king with peace of mind. I'm counting on you.

34176.「リン様は お姫様の身でありながら\n 毎日 厨房で 料理を手伝ってくださるんだ:
Even though she is a princess, Lynn- sama helps me cook in the kitchen every day. She is so happy to be able
to cook for her father. But Nikoroi is always out of the house. I wonder when she will be able to enjoy our
delicious meals.

34177.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「私ら年寄りが 昔の:
I hope you can at least understand why we old people keep secrets about the past. No one needs to know what once
happened in Abandoned Castle. It would only make Nikoroi unhappy.

34178.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「じいさんの言うとお:
Maybe Grandpa is right. Rita was a very kind girl. She must have had some circumstances that we could not have
imagined.

34179.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「昔は わしも 若か:
Once upon a time, I was young. At the time, all I could think of was getting away from the cursed castle as quickly
as possible. I'm sure the person who suffered the most was Rita-sama. I think so now.

34180.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「うっ うっ…… グ:
Ugh, ugh, gusun. You're so kind, Nikoroi-sama. I can't stop crying. It's Nikoroi's fault that I can't get
any work done.

34181.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ニコロイ王が:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>King Nikoroi has ordered Dr. Hanetsuki
to plant a new cherry tree. This is to
mourn the loss of Rita.

34182.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「やっとこさ ニ:
Just when I thought I could finally serve Nikoroi-sama a meal, she says she doesn't want it because she
doesn't have an appetite. Something must have happened at Abandoned Castle.

34183.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ええっ？ 捨て:

that was after our sacred ground at
Abandoned Castle?<yesno><break>

34184.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「あっはっはっは:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ha-ha-ha! If I could really do that, I
wouldn't dream of being a key emblem!

34185.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「あっはっはっは:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ha-ha-ha! I know, I know. You're
kidding, right?

34186.「真実は 時として 人をキズつける。\n だが ニコロイ様ならば それを乗りこえ:
True, it sometimes hurts people. But Nikoroi-sama will overcome this and become a better king than ever before.
You have saved our King Nikoroi's heart from the ties of the past.

34187.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「わしも ニコロイ王:
I also heard the true story of the past tragedy from King Nikoroi. In the Family Portrait brought by the King,
Rita is smiling happily. That may have been the last picture in which the real family was together.

34188.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「お戻りになられてか:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Since his return, Mr. Nikoroi has been
quiet and thinking about what happened
to him at Abandoned Castle.

34189.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「わしは ５０年前の:
Ever since that incident 50 years ago, I have always thought of Rita-sama as an abominable and sinister child. But
you know what? Looking back, she was a very gentle child. What a terrible thing I did.

34190.「５０年もの間 たったひとりで\n 人々を守るために 眠り続けていたなんて……。:
I can't believe that for 50 years she slept alone to protect people. I wonder how Rita must have felt. But
seeing Rita smiling in that portrait makes me think that perhaps the princess was happy. I think that
protecting her brother Nikoroi and people was more important to Rita than her own life.

34191.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「姉上は 命をか:
You risked your life to keep me alive. I will be the protector of the Holy Land. I will protect the country you
loved, no matter what. . I will not forget you. I will be there to help you when you lose your way.

34192.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ええっ？ 捨て:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>What? You took down the evil monster
that was after our sacred ground at
Abandoned Castle?<yesno><break>

34193.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あっはっはっは:
Ha-ha-ha! If I could really do that, it would be a key emblem! That's really Sakura Key Emblem, isn't it?
Wow. ~~~~~~.

34194.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あっはっはっは:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Ha-ha-ha! I know, I know. You're
kidding, right?

34195.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「うふふ。なんだ:
Hmmm. Somehow, I feel that today's cherry blossoms are blooming more beautifully than usual. I wonder if
flowers have hearts too.

34196.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「捨てられた城の:
We have just received a report that the sacred site of Abandoned Castle has suddenly regained its power! We
must investigate immediately!

34197.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「な…なんと！ リタ:
What a surprise! Rita-sama was the only one who sealed up Queen Agushuna's impersonation? It's an
unexpected story, but it makes sense in many ways. It is very likely that Rita could not tell anyone that her
real mother had died. She was still a young child, but perhaps it was her fate to be born as a white child.

34198.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「本当の母が 死んで:
It is very likely that Rita could not tell anyone that her real mother had died. Even Rita was still a child. Was
that the fate of the child born as a white child?

34199.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「キュウスケはん:
I heard that Kyusuke received the key emblem from King Nikoroi. I thought from the very beginning that he was
the key emblem holder. He really is an amazing person.

47791.「庭に置かれた石の 美しく完成された姿……\n 私も そうありたいと願いつつ 見:
As I looked at the beautifully finished stones in the garden, wishing I could be like them, I realized that
something was missing. I was told that there are several demon repelling stones called "Devil's Jade" on the
Inamino Highway, and among them there is a particularly magnificent large jade. I have heard that it is rare to
find a jade with a unique color called Azure Jade. If you would be so kind as to go down to Inamino Highway and
bring me some of that famous Azure Jade.

47792.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「引き受けていた:
Will you accept? Yes, I am very happy. Inamino Highway is just east of Kamiharmui South. Please take care of
it.

47793.「引き受けていただけるのですか？ \n ……でも あなた様は 他の頼まれごとで\:
Will you accept the offer?But you seem to have your hands full with other requests. I can't ask such a busy
person to do this for me. Please come back when you are free.

47794.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そうですか……。\:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I see. If you change your mind, we
would like you to visit us again.

47795.「ずっと 庭の石を見ていますと \n まだひとつ 足りないものがあることに\n:
I keep looking at the stones in the garden and realize that there is still one thing missing. Please bring me
some Azure Jade which can be found around the big Devil's Jade on Inamino Highway.

47796.「イナミノ街道は カミハルムイ領南から\n 東に抜けた場所でございますわ。\n:
Inamino Highway is just off Kamiharmui
South to the east. Please make
yourself at home.

47797.「まあ おかえりなさいませ。\n もしかして 紺碧のヒスイを\n 持ってきてくだ:
Well, welcome back. Did you by any
chance bring Azure Jade with you?

47798.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「これは 失礼しまし:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I apologize for this. It seems I was
wrong to be so hasty. My heart
overflowed with anticipation.

47799.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「さすがは 私の:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>As I expected of you.Come on, show me
quickly. What is this?<bw_hide><icon_exc>

47800.「深く美しい青空の中を 通りぬける \n ひとすじの雲……。これって……<bw_:

and beautiful blue sky. What is this?<bw_break>

47801.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「コレって チョ:

is perfect, too. I'm so happy!<bw_break>

47802.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「………………はっ！:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I'm so sorry! I'm so distraught that
I've done something completely out of
character. What a shame.<feel_sad_lv3>

48707.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「そう。私が 足:
Yes. What I felt was missing was a jade necklace to enhance my own beauty. With this jade, I can express
true beauty as perfectly as a garden stone in a beautifully simple garden. Thank you very much. I am truly
grateful for your generosity. Please accept it.

72188.「リン姫様には お会いになりましたか？ \n 私は リン様の養育係をまかされてい:

no. Do you smell something? I wonder what it is.

72189.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「まあまあ！ 私:

72190.<icon_exc>「ああっ！ 急に お腹に痛みが！\n 痛たた。こりゃ 痛い。:

those suspicious eyes? I don't like it. Trust me. Yes, I do. I'll teach you the "apologize" emoticon, and you
can use it to apologize to Master Lynn instead of me, who's stuck here with a stomachache.

53284.「ややっ？ 君は 魔法戦士のようだね。\n じつは ヴェリナードの魔法戦士団に\:
Ya? You seem to be an armamentalist. I've been trying to get a job with the Armamentalist Corps in Verinard, but I
haven't heard from them yet. You must be an armamentalist too. I wonder if Sub Leader Unaty at Verinard Castle
has heard anything?

44853.「ややっ。ヴェリナードの魔法戦士団から\n 派遣されてきたのは 君か！\n ぼく:
Oh, it's you who was dispatched from the Armamentalist Corps in Verinard! I'm Nishiki, the guy you asked for. I
went to Nagiri Cave in Kamiharmui South to take down a monster I'd never seen before, but I had a tough time
and had to run back. I found out that the monster was a Pogoin' Penguin, which lives only in the Wena Islands
and is not found around here. VerinardArmamentalistCorps should be able to take down a local monster with
ease, right? They'll take care of it, right?

44854.「う～ん。君は 多くの依頼を受けているな。\n 他の依頼を 終わらせてくれないと:

requests.

would take them out easily.

44856.「おっ 依頼を受ける気に なってくれたかい？ \n<br>\n「カミハルムイ領南:
Oh, you've decided to accept my offer, haven't you?I need you to take out a Wena Islands monster, Pogoin' Penguin,
that has appeared at Nagiri Cave in Kamiharmui South. It should be a piece of cake for the Verinard Armamentalist
Corps to take down a local monster, right? You'll take care of it, won't you?

45114.「おっ やってくれるのか。\n さすが ヴェリナード魔法戦士団。\n ナギリ洞は:

northeast of Kamiharmui South!

44858.「その魔物は ウェナ諸島にしか\n 棲息していないことが わかってる。\n 君な:

the Wena Islands. You should be able

44859.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ややっ。タップ:
I see you've finally fulfilled my request to take down Pogoin' Penguin! I've been waiting for your report. As
expected of the famed Verinard Armamentalist Corps, we'll have to thank you right away. But I thought
that it is customary for you Armamentalist Corps to receive the reward from the group, not from the
client. I'll send the reward to the Armamentalist Corps in Verinard Castle, so you can receive it there.
Well then, thank you very much for your hard work~!

44860.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「報酬は 依頼者:
It is the custom of your Armamentalist Corps to receive rewards from the corps, not from the client. I'll send
the reward to the Armamentalist Corps in Verinard Castle, so you can receive it there. Thank you very much for your
hard work!

44861.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「あれから タッ:
